pages.welcome.selfhostSubtitle: An unofficial selfhosted version of RecipeSage, a free recipe keeper, meal planner, and shopping list organizer for Web, IOS, and Android
pages.welcome.title: All of your recipes in one place
pages.welcome.subtitle: A free recipe keeper, meal planner, and shopping list organizer for Web, IOS, and Android
pages.welcome.description.1: RecipeSage is free (donation based) personal recipe keeper, meal planner, and shopping list manager for Web, IOS, and Android.
pages.welcome.description.2: Quickly capture and save recipes from any website simply by entering the website URL. Sync your recipes, meal plans, and shopping lists between all of your devices. Share your recipes, shopping lists, and meal plans with family and friends.
pages.welcome.description.features.1.des: Create a recipe simply by punching in a web URL
pages.welcome.description.features.2.des: Search every field within your recipes including misspellings and similar words
pages.welcome.description.features.3.des: Tag your recipes and filter by tags
pages.welcome.description.features.4.des: Schedule your meals interactively, quickly and easily
pages.welcome.description.features.5.des: Automatically categorized and intelligently grouped - add your recipes directly to a shopping list and similar items will be combined
pages.welcome.description.features.6.des: Share your recipes, collaborate on meal plans and shopping lists with your family or friends
pages.welcome.description.features.7.des: Supports Pepperplate, Living Cookbook, and Paprika
pages.welcome.description.features.8.des: Back up your recipes in multiple formats for data portability
pages.welcome.description.cta.3: Available on desktop and all mobile devices
pages.auth.selfhostWarning: Note: This is a selfhosted version of RecipeSage and is therefore not associated with RecipeSage.com or any of the accounts located on the main site.
pages.auth.welcome.login.sub: Please login with your account details below.
pages.auth.welcome.register.sub1: We need a few details to create your account.
pages.auth.welcome.register.sub2: After this, you'll be set up and ready to go.
pages.auth.input.name: Full Name or Nickname
pages.auth.selfhostWarning2: Make sure you trust the site owner of this selfhost copy
pages.home.errors.emptyCollection.title: This user's collection is empty
pages.home.errors.emptyCollection.messag: This shared collection has no recipes in it.
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.title: Welcome to RecipeSage!
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message1: This is where your recipes will appear.
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message2: It looks like you don't have any recipes yet.
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message3: Click the + button in the bottom right corner to add one!
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message5: Use the side menu to go to settings -> import
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message6: You can install the clip tool extension on desktop browsers:
pages.home.errors.noRecipes.message7: For detailed how-tos, visit the Tips Tricks & Tutorials page
pages.home.errors.inboxEmpty.message2: When someone sends you a recipe, it will show up here!
pages.home.errors.noSearchResults.messag: Title, description, source, ingredients, instructions, and notes.
pages.notfound.title: Page Not Found
pages.notfound.error.title: Page Not Found!
pages.notfound.error.message1: It looks like the page you are looking for doesn't exist.
pages.notfound.error.message2: Check to see if you typed the URL correctly.
pages.notfound.error.message3: If you're still having trouble, or if somewhere in the app took you here, please contact me.
pages.notfound.error.goHome: Click here to go to your recipes
pages.homepopover.options.sortBy.title: Title
pages.homepopover.warning.optionsHidden: Note: some options are hidden, since this is a shared collection
pages.recipeDetails.sentBy: This recipe was sent to you by {{name}}
pages.recipeDetails.sentByAction: Add this recipe to your recipes by clicking the button at the bottom of the page.
pages.recipeDetails.mustSaveBeforeLabell: You can add labels once you save this recipe to your collection
pages.recipeDetails.saveToMyRecipes: Save This Recipe to My Recipes
pages.recipeDetails.doesNotBelongToYou: This recipe does not belong to you yet.
pages.recipeDetails.requiresAccountToSav: Create an account or login to save this recipe to your collection.
